ConstructionState dataclass

Used to describe a motion event that occurred at a position. Used in ProcessState to remember Motion Events in a MotionDict.

class ConstructionState.ConstructionState(event_pos, event_code, part_id, deviated, misplaced, unnecessary, time_registered)

Bases: object

Dataclass that contains information about the construction state of a layout.
